OUTLINE : This randomize study . Patients stratify accord tumor subtype ( astrocytoma [ mixed-astro dominant equal astro/oligo mix ] v oligodendroglioma [ mixed-oligo dominant ] ) , age ( young 40 v least 40 ) , Karnofsky performance status ( 60-80 % vs 90-100 % ) , contrast enhancement preoperative scan ( present v absent ) . Patients low-risk disease ( young 40 year old whose tumor surgically remove ) assign arm I . Patients high-risk disease ( least 40 year old incomplete tumor removal ) randomize arm II III . - Arm I ( low-risk patient ) : Patients observe . Patients may receive treatment tumor recurs . - Arm II ( high-risk patient ) : Patients receive daily external beam radiotherapy 5 day week 6 week . - Arm III ( high-risk patient ) : Patients receive radiotherapy arm II follow chemotherapy 1 month later . Chemotherapy consist oral lomustine day 1 , vincristine IV day 8 29 , oral procarbazine day 8-21 . Each course chemotherapy last 8 week . Patients may receive 6 course chemotherapy . Patients follow every 4 month 1 year , every 6 month 2 year , annually thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 252 patient accrue within 5.25 year .
